New Roster (Age of Sigmar) [3,590pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Destruction - Orruk Warclans) [3,590pts]

    • Leader [1,830pts]

      • Gordrakk, the Fist of Gork [540pts]

        Categories: Behemoth, DESTRUCTION, HERO, Leader, IRONJAWZ

        Rules: Gordrakk, the Fist of Gork

        Command Abilities: Voice of Gork, Maw-Krusha: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Unit: Gordrakk, the Fist of Gork, Unit Abilities: Destructive Bulk, Fly, Kunnin', On the Rampage, Smasha, Strength from Victory, Weapon: Innard-bursting Bellow, Kunnin', Mighty Fists and Tail, Smasha


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Voice of Gork You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick up to 3 friendly DESTRUCTION units wholly within 24" of this model. Until the end of that phase, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase, and a unit cannot benefit from this ability and the Go on Ladz, Get Stuck In! ability in the same phase.
        Maw-Krusha MoveMighty FistsDestructive Bulk Ref
        00-03 12"99 dice
        04-06 10"88 dice
        07-09 8"77 dice
        10-12 6"66 dice
        13+ 4"55 dice
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Gordrakk, the Fist of Gork *1683+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Destructive Bulk After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a number of dice equal to the Massively Destructive Bulk value on this model’s damage table. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

        In addition, after this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 terrain feature within 1" of this model and roll a number of dice equal to the Massively Destructive Bulk value on this model’s damage table. If any of the dice are a 6, units no longer receive the cover modifier to their save rolls for being on or within that terrain feature.

        If the mortal wounds inflicted by this model’s Massively Destructive Bulk mean there are no enemy models left within 3" of it, then it can attempt to make another charge move, and can make another Massively Destructive Bulk attack after that move if the charge is successfully carried out. This model can attempt to make any number of charge moves in a single turn, so long as each one results in all enemy models within 3" being slain.
        Fly Bigteef can fly.
        Kunnin' If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by Kunnin’ that targets a WIZARD is 4+, that attack inflicts D3 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).
        On the Rampage If the wounds inflicted by Bigteef's Destructive Bulk attack means that there are no enemy models left within 3" of him, then he can immediately make another charge move (and can make another Destructive Bulk attack after the move if the charge has been successfully carried out). Bigteef can make any number of charge moves like this in a single turn, so long as each one results in all enemy models within 3" being slain.
        Smasha If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by Smasha that targets a HERO that is not a WIZARD is 4+, that attack inflicts D3 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll or damage roll).
        Strength from Victory At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, add 1 to this model’s Wounds characteristic and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Smasha and Kunnin’.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Innard-bursting Bellow Missile8"62+3+-11
        Kunnin' Melee1"52+3+-11
        Mighty Fists and Tail Melee1"*3+3+-22
        Smasha Melee1"52+3+-1D3

      • Maniak Weirdnob [120pts]

        Categories: WIZARD, DESTRUCTION, Orruk, BONESPLITTERZ, HERO, Maniak Weirdnob, Leader

        Magic: Maniak Weirdnob, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Bone Spirit, Fireball, Mystic Shield, Unit: Maniak Weirdnob, Unit Abilities: Ju-ju Squig, Tusker Charge, Weapon: Bonebeast Staff, Tusks and Hooves


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Maniak Weirdnob 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Bone Spirit
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Bone Spirit 7If this spell is successfully cast, you can pick 1 friendly BONESPLITTERZ unit wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made by that unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1.
        Fireball 5If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. If that enemy unit has 1 model, it suffers 1 mortal wound; if it has 2-9 models, it suffers D3 mortal wounds; and if it has 10 or more models, it suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Maniak Weirdnob 12"676+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Ju-ju Squig Once per turn, you can re-roll a casting, dispelling or unbinding roll for this model.
        Tusker Charge Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made with this unit’s Tusks and Hooves if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.

        Destructive Bulk After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a number of dice equal to the Destructive Bulk value on this model’s damage table. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

        Power of the Waaagh! Add 1 to a Weirdnob Shaman's casting or unbinding rolls if there are 10 or more ORRUK models within 10". Add 2 to the roll instead if there are 20 or more ORRUK models within 10". However, if the casting or unbinding roll was a double, then the closest other friendly Orruk unit within 10" of the Weirdnob Shaman suffers D3 mortal wounds.

If you do so, pick 1 friendly BONESPLITTERZ unit wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.

        Savage Big Boss 5"676+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Let Me At ’Em After this model has fought in a combat phase for the first time, you can pick 1 friendly BONESPLITTERZ unit that has not yet fought in that combat phase, that is within 3" of an enemy unit and that is wholly within 12" of this model. That unit fights immediately, before the opposing player picks a unit to fight in that combat phase. That unit cannot fight again in that combat phase unless an ability or spell allows it to fight more than once.

        Bone Totems 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Bone Totem Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit while it includes any Bone Totem Bearers.
        Savage Boss 1 model in this unit can be a Savage Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Chompa or Savage Stikka.
        Skull Thumper 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Skull Thumper. Add 2 to charge rolls for a unit while it includes any Skull Thumpers.
        Spirit of Gorkamorka Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by this unit while it has 15 or more models.

    • Battalion [680pts]

      • Battalion: Kunnin' Rukk [240pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Dead Sneaky

        • Savage Big Boss [100pts]

          Categories: DESTRUCTION, Orruk, BONESPLITTERZ, HERO, Savage Big Boss, Leader

          Command Abilities: Savage Attack, Unit: Savage Big Boss, Unit Abilities: Let Me At ’Em, Weapon: Boss Chompa


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Dead Sneaky In your hero phase, pick 1 unit from this battalion that is wholly within 12" of the SAVAGE BIG BOSS from the same battalion. That unit can make a normal move or shoot. Units from this battalion cannot have more than 20 models.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Savage Attack You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly BONESPLITTERZ unit wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made by that unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Savage Big Boss 5"676+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Let Me At ’Em After this model has fought in a combat phase for the first time, you can pick 1 friendly BONESPLITTERZ unit that has not yet fought in that combat phase, that is within 3" of an enemy unit and that is wholly within 12" of this model. That unit fights immediately, before the opposing player picks a unit to fight in that combat phase. That unit cannot fight again in that combat phase unless an ability or spell allows it to fight more than once.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Boss Chompa Melee1"63+3+-12

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: We're Da Best!

        • Savage Big Boss [100pts]

          Categories: DESTRUCTION, Orruk, BONESPLITTERZ, HERO, Savage Big Boss, Leader

          Command Abilities: Savage Attack, Unit: Savage Big Boss, Unit Abilities: Let Me At ’Em, Weapon: Boss Chompa

        We're Da Best! Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by units from this battalion while they are wholly within 12" of the SAVAGE BIG BOSS from the same battalion.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Savage Attack You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly BONESPLITTERZ unit wholly within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made by that unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1.         Savage Big Boss 5"676+
        Savage Big Stabbas 5"466+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Da Final Fling Each time a model from this unit is slain by an attack made with a melee weapon, before the model is removed from play, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of the slain model and roll a dice. Add 2 to the roll if that enemy unit is a MONSTER. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Let Me At ’Em After this model has fought in a combat phase for the first time, you can pick 1 friendly BONESPLITTERZ unit that has not yet fought in that combat phase, that is within 3" of an enemy unit and that is wholly within 12" of this model. That unit fights immediately, before the opposing player picks a unit to fight in that combat phase. That unit cannot fight again in that combat phase unless an ability or spell allows it to fight more than once.
        Savagely Enthusiastic This unit can run and still charge in the same turn.
        The Bigger They Are... The Damage characteristic of an attack made with a Gorktoof is D6 if the target is a MONSTER.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Big Waaagh!

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Waaagh! Magic, Command Abilities: Da Big Waaagh!, ’Ere We Go, ’Ere We Go, ’Ere We Go!


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Waaagh! Magic If you have a Big Waaagh! army with at least 6 Waaagh! points, before making any casting, dispelling or unbinding rolls for a friendly WIZARD, you can say that they will draw on the power of the Waaagh! If you do so, you can reduce your army’s Waaagh! points by D3 points and add 1 to that casting, dispelling or unbind roll, or by D6 points and add 2 to that casting, dispelling or unbind roll.

        You cannot use this battle trait more than once for the same WIZARD in the same phase.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Da Big Waaagh! You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase if you have a Big Waaagh! army with at least 24 Waaagh! points and your general is on the battlefield. If you do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly ORRUK units until the end of that phase. You cannot use this command ability more than once per phase.

        At the end of any phase in which you use this command ability, you must roll a dice. On a 1, reduce the Waaagh! points for your army to 0. On a 2-5, halve the Waaagh! points for your army (rounding down). On a 6, nothing happens.
        ’Ere We Go, ’Ere We Go, ’Ere We Go! You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase. If you do so, choose 1 friendly ORRUK HERO. You receive 1 Waaagh! point for every 10 ORRUK models that are within 12" of that ORRUK HERO, or within 18" of that ORRUK HERO if they are a general or a WARCHANTER. You cannot use this command ability more than once in the same phase.

        Selections: Big Waaagh!

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Waaagh! Magic, Command Abilities: Da Big Waaagh!, ’Ere We Go, ’Ere We Go, ’Ere We Go!

If you do so, you can reduce your army’s Waaagh! points by D3 points and add 1 to that casting, dispelling or unbind roll, or by D6 points and add 2 to that casting, dispelling or unbind roll.

        You cannot use this battle trait more than once for the same WIZARD in the same phase.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Da Big Waaagh! You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase if you have a Big Waaagh! army with at least 24 Waaagh! points and your general is on the battlefield. If you do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly ORRUK units until the end of that phase. You cannot use this command ability more than once per phase.

        At the end of any phase in which you use this command ability, you must roll a dice. On a 1, reduce the Waaagh! points for your army to 0. On a 2-5, halve the Waaagh! points for your army (rounding down). On a 6, nothing happens.
        ’Ere We Go, ’Ere We Go, ’Ere We Go! You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase. If you do so, choose 1 friendly ORRUK HERO.     • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

Selection Rules

Gordrakk, the Fist of Gork: Gordrakk, the Fist of Gork is a single model. Gordrakk is armed with two axes, one called Smasha and the other Kunnin'. He rides into battle on the back of a huge Maw-krusha called Bigteef, who batters opponents with his Mighty Fists, flatten them with his Destructive Bulk, and smashes them with his Bladed Tail. Even his Innard-bursting Bellow can kill foes! ()

Gore-Grunta Boss: The leader of each unit is a Gore-grunta Boss. They make 4 attacks rather than 3. ()

Megaboss on Maw-krusha: A Megaboss on Maw-krusha is a single model. The Megaboss rides on the Maw-krusha's backand is armed with a Boss Gore-hacka and a Scrap-toof or a Choppa and a Rip-toof Fist. The Maw-krusha can batter opponents with its Mighty Fists, flatten them with its Destructive Bulk, or smash them with its Bladed Tail, while its Innard-bursting Bellow can kill foes from afar. ()

Orruk Gore-Gruntas: A unit of Orruk Gore-Gruntas has 3 or more models. The riders of some units of Gore-Gruntas are armed with Pig-iron Choppas, while others carry Jagged Gore-hackas. Their mounts tear at the enemy with their Fanged Maws and Hooves. ()
